public class OrmLiteSimpleContentProvider.OrmLiteSqliteSimpleHelper
extends com.j256.ormlite.android.apptools.OrmLiteSqliteOpenHelper

It is a simple implementation class OrmLiteSqliteOpenHelper. It takes the necessary information from OrmLiteSimpleContentProvider.
